sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Delete NLU model - "NLU to track UR status" because the intent present in the model is merged in the "UR: NLU Model for VA" model.</description> <name>Delete model: NLU to track UR status</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[deleteTrackURStatusModel();
function deleteTrackURStatusModel() { if (GlidePluginManager().isActive("com.snc.universal_request.nlu")) { var modelGr = new GlideRecord("sys_nlu_model"); if (modelGr.get("95d979c253b22010b87bddeeff7b12c8")) //sys_id of NLU model: NLU to track UR status modelGr.deleteRecord(); } }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-10-07 07:33:50</sys_created_on> <sys_id>3270be2553833010f155ddeeff7b12cf</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Delete model: NLU to track UR status</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Universal Request Core" source="com.snc.universal_request_core">b5a085c76d2620100acb70b3534330be</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_3270be2553833010f155ddeeff7b12cf</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-10-07 10:29:45</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Delete model: NLU to track UR status
